name: S. Elf Defense
description:
Protect the South Pole from it becoming another toy factory for Santa and his forces. Build towers ammo plants to stop an onslaught of  enemies (can you find the surprise enemy?).  Go and loop through the 4 seasons and fight on different locations. 

LMB-Drag and drop turrets on to the battlefield

RMB-Sell tower/cancelling placement of tower

Made with Game Maker Studio 2

Followed Caveblazzers challenge
